entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon then light late in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
